briefdescription.para: The issue Cause enum class.

detaileddescription.para: Enum to describe the cause of issue a given issue is.

briefdescription.para: The issue Level enum class.

detaileddescription.para: Enum to describe the level of severity that a given issue has.

briefdescription.para: The issue Reference enum class.

detaileddescription.para: Enum to describe the rule which the issue addresses.

briefdescription.para: Forward declaration for pImpl idiom.

detaileddescription.para: Private member to implementation pointer

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Copy constructor.
Move constructor.
Assignment operator.
Set the description for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the std::string description for why this issue was raised.

parameterdescription.para: The std::string issue description to set.

briefdescription.para: Get the description for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the std::string description for why this issue was raised.

simplesect.para: The std::string description of the issue.

briefdescription.para: Set the cause of this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the cause of this issue from the options available in Issue::Cause.

briefdescription.para: Get the cause of this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the cause of this issue. If no cause has been set for this issue, will return Cause::UNDEFINED.

simplesect.para: The Issue::Cause set for this issue.

briefdescription.para: Set the level of this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the level of this issue from the options available in Issue::Level.

briefdescription.para: Get the level of this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the level of this issue. If no level has been set for this issue, will return Level::ERROR.

simplesect.para: The Issue::Level set for this issue.

briefdescription.para: Set the enum ReferenceRule of this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the referenceRule of this issue from the options available in the ReferenceRule enum.

briefdescription.para: Get the enum ReferenceRule of this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the enum ReferenceRule value of this issue. If no reference rule has been set for this issue, return ReferenceRule::UNDEFINED.

briefdescription.para: Get the std::string heading associated with the enum ReferenceRule for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the std::string libCellML Reference heading associated with the enum ReferenceRule for this issue. If no rule has been set for this issue, will return an empty string.

simplesect.para: The std::string libCellML Reference heading relevant to this issue.

briefdescription.para: Set the component for this component issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the component that this component issue is relevant to.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the component that this component issue is relevant to.

briefdescription.para: Get the component for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the component that this issue is relevant to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the component that this issue was raised on. If no component has been set for this issue, return a nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Set the import source for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the ImportSourcePtr importSource object that this issue is relevant to.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the import source that this issue is relevant to.

briefdescription.para: Get the import source for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the ImportSourcePtr import source for this issue.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the import source this issue was raised on. If no import source has been set for this issue, return a nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Set the model for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the model that this issue is relevant to.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the model that this issue is relevant to.

briefdescription.para: Get the model for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the model that this issue is relevant to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the model that this issue was raised on. If no model has been set for this issue, return a nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Set the units for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the units that this issue is relevant to.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the units this issue is relevant to.

briefdescription.para: Get the units for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the units that this issue is relevant to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the units that this issue was raised on. If no units has been set for this issue, return a nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Set the variable for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the variable that this issue is relevant to.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the variable this issue is relevant to.

briefdescription.para: Get the variable for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the variable that this issue is relevant to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the variable this variable issue was raised on. If no variable has been set for this issue, return a nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Set the reset for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Set the reset that this issue is relevant to.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the reset this issue is relevant to.

briefdescription.para: Get the reset for this issue.

detaileddescription.para: Get the reset that this issue is relevant to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the reset this reset issue was raised on. If no reset has been set for this issue, return a nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Create an Issue object.

detaileddescription.para: Factory method to create an Issue. Can create a blank issue with::
IssuePtr issue = libcellml::Issue::create();
or an issue with one of the following types as a parameter::
The default values for the enumerations are::

simplesect.para: A smart pointer to an Issue object.

briefdescription.para: The Issue class.
